001package org.consensusj.jsonrpc.cli;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.TextNode;
006import org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine;
007import org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLineParser;
008import org.apache.commons.cli.DefaultParser;
009import org.apache.commons.cli.HelpFormatter;
010import org.apache.commons.cli.Options;
011import org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException;
012import org.consensusj.jsonrpc.AbstractRpcClient;
013import org.consensusj.jsonrpc.CompositeTrustManager;
014import org.consensusj.jsonrpc.JsonRpcClientJavaNet;
015import org.consensusj.jsonrpc.JsonRpcException;
016import org.consensusj.jsonrpc.JsonRpcMessage;
017import org.consensusj.jsonrpc.JsonRpcRequest;
018import org.consensusj.jsonrpc.JsonRpcResponse;
019import org.slf4j.Logger;
020import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
021
022import javax.net.ssl.SSLContext;
023import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
024import java.io.IOException;
025import java.io.PrintWriter;
026import java.net.URI;
027import java.net.URISyntaxException;
028import java.nio.file.Path;
029import java.security.KeyManagementException;
030import java.security.KeyStoreException;
031import java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException;
032import java.security.cert.CertificateException;
033import java.util.List;
034
035/**
036 * An abstract base class for JsonRpcClientTool that uses Apache Commons CLI
037 */
038public abstract class BaseJsonRpcTool implements JsonRpcClientTool {
039    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(BaseJsonRpcTool.class);
040    private static final String name = "jsonrpc";
041    protected static final URI defaultUri = URI.create("http://localhost:8080/");
042    protected final String usage ="usage string";
043    protected final HelpFormatter formatter = new HelpFormatter();
044    protected JsonRpcMessage.Version jsonRpcVersion = JsonRpcMessage.Version.V2;
045    protected JsonRpcClientTool.OutputObject outputObject = OutputObject.RESULT;
046    //protected JsonRpcClientTool.OutputFormat outputFormat = OutputFormat.JSON;
047    protected JsonRpcClientTool.OutputStyle outputStyle = OutputStyle.PRETTY;
048
049    public BaseJsonRpcTool() {
050        formatter.setLongOptPrefix("-");
051    }
052
053    @Override
054    public String name() {
055        return name;
056    }
057
058    public String usage() {
059        return usage;
060    }
061
062    abstract public Options options();
063
064    @Override
065    public CommonsCLICall createCall(PrintWriter out, PrintWriter err, String... args) {
066        return new CommonsCLICall(this, out, err, args);
067    }
068
069    @Override
070    public void run(Call call) {
071        run((CommonsCLICall) call);
072    }
073    
074    public void run(CommonsCLICall call) {
075        List<String> args = call.line.getArgList();
076        if (args.size() == 0) {
077            printError(call, "jsonrpc method required");
078            printHelp(call, usage);
079            throw new ToolException(1, "jsonrpc method required");
080        }
081        if (call.line.hasOption("response")) {
082            // Print full JsonRpcResponse as output
083            outputObject = OutputObject.RESPONSE;
084        }
085        if (call.line.hasOption("V1")) {
086            jsonRpcVersion = JsonRpcMessage.Version.V1;
087        }
088        SSLContext sslSocketFactory = sslContext(call.line);
089        AbstractRpcClient client = call.rpcClient(sslSocketFactory);
090        CliParameterParser parser = new CliParameterParser(jsonRpcVersion, client.getMapper());
091        JsonRpcRequest request = parser.parse(args);
092        JsonRpcResponse<JsonNode> response;
093        try {
094            response = client.sendRequestForResponse(request);
095        } catch (JsonRpcException e) {
096            log.error("send exception: ", e);
097            throw new ToolException(1, e.getMessage());
098        } catch (IOException e) {
099            log.error("send exception: ", e);
100            throw new ToolException(1, e.getMessage());
101        }
102        String resultForPrinting = formatResponse(response, client.getMapper());
103        call.out.println(resultForPrinting);
104    }
105
106    SSLContext sslContext(CommandLine line) {
107        SSLContext sslContext;
108        if (line.hasOption("add-truststore")) {
109            // Create SSL sockets using additional truststore and CompositeTrustManager
110            String trustStorePathString = line.getOptionValue("add-truststore");
111            Path trustStorePath = Path.of(trustStorePathString);
112            try {
113                sslContext = CompositeTrustManager.getCompositeSSLContext(trustStorePath);
114            } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | KeyManagementException | FileNotFoundException e) {
115                throw new ToolException(1, e.getMessage());
116            }
117        } else if (line.hasOption("alt-truststore")) {
118            // Create SSL sockets using alternate truststore
119            String trustStorePathString = line.getOptionValue("alt-truststore");
120            Path trustStorePath = Path.of(trustStorePathString);
121            try {
122                sslContext = CompositeTrustManager.getAlternateSSLContext(trustStorePath);
123            } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | KeyManagementException | CertificateException | KeyStoreException | IOException e) {
124                throw new ToolException(1, e.getMessage());
125            }
126        } else {
127            // Otherwise, use the default SSLSocketFactory
128            try {
129                sslContext = SSLContext.getDefault();
130            } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException e) {
131                throw new RuntimeException(e);
132            }
133        }
134        return sslContext;
135    }
136
137    private String formatResponse(JsonRpcResponse<?> response, ObjectMapper mapper) {
138        String string;
139        if (response.getResult() == null || response.getError() != null || outputObject == OutputObject.RESPONSE) {
140            JsonNode reponseAsNode = mapper.valueToTree(response);
141            string = reponseAsNode.toPrettyString();
142        } else {
143            Object result = response.getResult();
144            if (result == null) {
145                log.info("result is null");
146                string = "null";
147            } else if (result instanceof JsonNode) {
148                log.info("result instanceof JsonNode");
149                if (result instanceof TextNode) {
150                    // This will remove the surrounding quotes and not print `\n` for newlines
151                    string = ((TextNode) result).asText();
152                } else if (outputStyle == OutputStyle.PRETTY) {
153                    string = ((JsonNode) result).toPrettyString();
154                } else {
155                    string = result.toString();
156                }
157            } else {
158                log.info("result class is: {}", result.getClass());
159                string = result.toString();
160            }
161        }
162        return string;
163    }
164
165    public void printHelp(Call call, String usage) {
166        int leftPad = 4;
167        int descPad = 2;
168        int helpWidth = 120;
169        String header = "";
170        String footer = "";
171        formatter.printHelp(call.err, helpWidth, usage, header, options(), leftPad, descPad, footer, false);
172    }
173
174    public void printError(Call call, String str) {
175        call.err.println(str);
176    }
177
178    public static class CommonsCLICall extends JsonRpcClientTool.Call {
179        protected final BaseJsonRpcTool rpcTool;
180        public final CommandLine line;
181        public final boolean verbose;
182        private AbstractRpcClient client;
183
184        public CommonsCLICall(BaseJsonRpcTool parentTool, PrintWriter out, PrintWriter err, String[] args) {
185            super(out, err, args);
186            this.rpcTool = parentTool;
187            CommandLineParser parser = new DefaultParser();
188            try {
189                this.line = parser.parse(rpcTool.options(), args);
190            } catch (ParseException e) {
191                rpcTool.printError(this, e.getMessage());
192                rpcTool.printHelp(this, rpcTool.usage());
193                throw new JsonRpcClientTool.ToolException(1, "Parser error");
194            }
195            if (line.hasOption("?")) {
196                rpcTool.printHelp(this, rpcTool.usage());
197                throw new JsonRpcClientTool.ToolException(0, "Help Option was chosen");
198            }
199            verbose = line.hasOption("v");
200            if (verbose) {
201                JavaLoggingSupport.setVerbose();
202            }
203            // TODO: Add rpcwait option for non-Bitcoin JsonRPC???
204        }
205
206        @Override
207        public AbstractRpcClient rpcClient(SSLContext sslContext) {
208            if (client == null) {
209                URI uri;
210                String urlString;
211                if ((urlString = line.getOptionValue("url")) != null ) {
212                    try {
213                        uri = new URI(urlString);
214                    } catch (URISyntaxException e) {
215                        throw new RuntimeException(e);
216                    }
217                } else {
218                    uri = defaultUri;
219                }
220                String rpcUser = null;
221                String rpcPassword = null;
222                String rawUserInfo = uri.getRawUserInfo();
223                if (rawUserInfo != null) {
224                    String[] split = rawUserInfo.split(":");
225                    rpcUser = split[0];
226                    rpcPassword = split[1];
227                }
228                client = new JsonRpcClientJavaNet(sslContext, rpcTool.jsonRpcVersion, uri, rpcUser, rpcPassword);
229            }
230            return client;
231        }
232
233        @Override
234        public AbstractRpcClient rpcClient() {
235            SSLContext sslContext;
236            try {
237                sslContext = SSLContext.getDefault();
238            } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException e) {
239                throw new RuntimeException(e);
240            }
241            return rpcClient(sslContext);
242        }
243    }
244}
